abstract: State Senate majority leader, Dean G. Skelos and actor Alec Baldwin took to the Internet to argue the merits of a millionaires’ tax or, more precisely, to call each other names.
snippet: State Senate majority leader, Dean G. Skelos and actor Alec Baldwin took to the Internet to argue the merits of a millionaires’ tax or, more precisely, to call each other names.

headline.main: Skelos and Baldwin Get in Each Other's Faces Over Taxes, via Twitter
headline.print_headline: Well, Just Try Saying That to My Face! Actor and Senator Tussle on Twitter
